page.title: 13EVENTS IN TERLING
page.content: Until this year there has always been a Parish Supper, held in the school hall on Shrove Tuesday, which has consisted of a 3 course meal with wine. Also,for the past 2 years there has been a Concert and supper arranged by the Church choir. The Church usually has a summer fete in the grounds of Terling Place, and this year it was combined with a Flower Festival in the Church and an exhibition of children's art in the chapel. Every summer the numerous clubs combine for a Summer Festival, each providing a stall or activity. This year it was held on the Church Green and the theme was "Merry Old England", and for the first time the School ran a stall and a display of Country Dancing. The day had begun with a Half Marathon round the village and it ended with a Barbeque and Disco
